solution_line_template: Three puppies on sale cost ${sale_price_per_puppy} x {sale_puppies} = $<<{sale_price_per_puppy}*{sale_puppies}={sale_total}>>{sale_total}.
So, each of those two other puppies cost ${other_puppies_cost}/{other_puppies} = $<<{other_puppies_cost}/{other_puppies}={each_other_puppy_cost}>>{each_other_puppy_cost}.
